title: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, and pancetta.
instructions: Cook spaghetti. Fry pancetta. Mix eggs and cheese. Combine all with pasta.

title: Chicken Stir-Fry
description: A quick and healthy stir-fry with chicken and vegetables.
instructions: Cook chicken. Stir-fry vegetables. Add sauce and mix.
